snippet.title: Energy Survivors - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
In Energy Survivors, you play as a mercenary in a third-person shooter roguelite game. Your mission is to invade a hostile planet in search of its energy source. You can choose from a variety of upgrades to create unique and powerful builds that can change the course of the game.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2145190/ENERGY_SURVIVORS/
